attributes.action: Provide Hand Sanitiser at all major Supermarkets & rail station and on all Buses
attributes.additional_details: To promote safe and clean hands to combat the Coronavirus
attributes.background: the government to provide Hand Sanitiser to everyone at Major Supermarkets, Railways Stations and on all Buses, this needs to be done NOW to get people to keep their hand s clean from the  Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300758

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
